requirements.summary: Deploy frontend to Internet Computer production network with permanent .ic0.app URL accessible on mobile and laptop devices
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend deploys successfully to production network
URL is publicly accessible without authentication
Application is fully functional on mobile devices
Application is fully functional on laptop/desktop devices

file_operations.description: Update the page title from generic 'Career Guidance Platform' to 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator' for better branding when deployed to production. Ensure all meta tags support mobile viewport and responsive rendering.

Verify responsive mobile menu functionality works correctly across different screen sizes. Ensure the hamburger menu on mobile devices properly toggles navigation links and maintains accessibility for touch interactions on mobile devices.

Verify hero section with generated/hero-students.dim_1200x600.png renders properly on both mobile and desktop viewports. Ensure call-to-action buttons are touch-friendly on mobile devices with adequate spacing.

Verify the grid layout displaying all 8 module cards (Career Path, India vs Abroad, Stream Selector, AI Chatbot, FutureMap, Regional Language, AR Explorer, Degree Finder) with their respective icon assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-*.dim_128x128.png) renders responsively on mobile and desktop. Ensure touch targets are adequate for mobile interaction.

Verify all 14 routes are properly configured for production deployment and work correctly when accessed via the .ic0.app URL. Ensure TanStack Router handles navigation properly in the production environment without any base path issues.

requirements.summary: Verify production deployment accessibility and ensure all 8 feature modules remain functional 24/7 without platform login requirement
acceptanceCriteria: Production URL remains accessible after deployment completes
No platform authentication required to view the live application
Application maintains uptime on Internet Computer network
All 8 feature modules are functional in production

file_operations.description: Ensure the authentication page clearly communicates that Internet Identity login is optional and used only for saving progress and bookmarking features. Public browsing of all 8 modules should work without authentication.

Verify career exploration and subject selection functionality works for unauthenticated users, with bookmark features gracefully disabled or prompting login only when bookmark actions are attempted. Ensure core browsing experience works without authentication.

Verify searchable degree list displays correctly for all users regardless of authentication state. Ensure bookmark functionality is appropriately hidden or disabled for unauthenticated users without blocking core degree browsing.

Verify the 5-question quiz works for unauthenticated users, with quiz results displayed correctly. Saving results to backend should only occur for authenticated users, with appropriate messaging if user is not logged in.

Verify the backend actor initialization works correctly in production environment with proper canister ID resolution from the deployed .ic0.app URL. Ensure the authorization component properly handles both authenticated and anonymous users without blocking public access.
